Sentencas: The model gas operation experiments of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) were carried out using the fuel with various water to methane ratio.
Titulo: Anodic reaction mechanism of solid oxide fuel cell with water-methane fuel

Sentencas: The pre-mixed gases corresponding to the thermal equilibrium composition were used as fuel to separate electrochemical reactions an an anode from the steam reforming reactions.
Titulo: Anodic reaction mechanism of solid oxide fuel cell with water-methane fuel

Sentencas: A kinetic behavior of the Langmuir-Hinshelwood type was observed for the anodic reactions.
Titulo: Anodic reaction mechanism of solid oxide fuel cell with water-methane fuel

Sentencas: The reaction mechanisms on the anode were quantitatively clarified at different steam to methane ratios by using the electron mass balance and measured anode exit gas composition.
Titulo: Anodic reaction mechanism of solid oxide fuel cell with water-methane fuel

Sentencas: The relationship between the steam to methane ratio and the overpotential could be explained by proposed reaction mechanisms.
Titulo: Anodic reaction mechanism of solid oxide fuel cell with water-methane fuel
